OOC: Mutate's still surrounded in radiation. That
action should cause damage to both bots.

Mutate's already damaged left arm is taken out. He
draws his stun pistol and fires at point blank range,
knowing the radiation will boost the blast.

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> As the energon wave neared the mysterious bot, he
> did not move, that is not 
> until the beam was just a few inches from him, that
> is when he simply side 
> stepped, letting the beam fly past. him. He then
> boosted forward at an 
> incredible speed as it drew two large double bladed
> sword type things and 
> brought them infront of him the ends connecting
> together. He then slashed at 
> Transmutate with both sides of the double sides
> double bladed staff/sword 
> thing which glowed slightly with the deadly
> chaochitan energy that Hellpeon 
> was so fond of using.
>
